remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果可能, 此方法会将固定量的数据输出到序列中。This method copies a fixed amount of data out of the sequence if possible. 它不会推进读者。It does not advance the reader. 若要预先查找特定的数据流, 请使用。To look ahead for a specific stream of data, use .
